'''UR''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] meaning "warmth", "be hot" (compare root [[AS]]).<ref name=Elda>{{PE|Eldarin}}, pp. 148, 188</ref><ref name=Ety396>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 396</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''urya-'' ("be hot"); ''[[Sun#Names of the Sun|Úrin]]''; ''aurĭ-'' ("heat, period of sun"); ''[[aure]]'' ("day")<ref name=Elda/>
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[aur]]'' ("sunlight, day")

==Other versions of the legendarium==

In the [[the Etymologies|''Etymologies'']], the meaning of root UR as "be hot" was changed to meaning "wide, large, great", with the derivatives [[Quenya]] ''úra'' ("large"), ''[[Eönwë|Úrien]]'', and [[Noldorin]] ''ûr'' ("wide").<ref name=Ety396/><ref>{{VT|46a}}, p. 20</ref>

In the ''[[Qenya Lexicon]]'' appears the root URU, with the [[Qenya]] derivative ''ūrin'' ("blazing hot").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref>
